🚨 Install AI Disaster Management Platform

📱 For iPhone/iPad (Safari)

  1. Open Safari and go to the AI Disaster Management Platform
  2. Tap the Share button (square with arrow)
  3. Scroll down and tap "Add to Home Screen"
  4. Tap "Add" to confirm
  5. The app icon will appear on your home screen!

🤖 For Android (Chrome)

  1. Open Chrome and go to the AI Disaster Management Platform
  2. Look for the "Install" button in the address bar
  3. Or tap the menu (⋮) and select "Install app"
  4. Tap "Install" to confirm
  5. The app will be added to your home screen!

💻 For Desktop (Chrome/Edge)

  1. Open Chrome or Edge and go to the AI Disaster Management Platform
  2. Look for the install icon in the address bar
  3. Click "Install" when prompted
  4. The app will open in its own window like a native app!

✨ Benefits of Installing

  • 🚀 Faster Access: Launch directly from home screen
  • 📱 App-like Experience: Full screen, no browser UI
  • 🔔 Push Notifications: Get emergency alerts instantly
  • 📶 Offline Support: Works even without internet
  • 🔒 Secure: HTTPS encrypted and safe

🆘 Emergency Features

Once installed, you'll have quick access to:

  • 🚨 SOS Button: Send emergency distress signal
  • 🏥 Safe Places: Find nearby emergency shelters
  • 🤖 AI Assistant: Get emergency guidance
  • 📞 Emergency Contacts: Quick dial emergency services
  • 🗺️ Real-time Maps: See danger zones and safe routes

Stay Safe with AI Disaster Management! 🛡️
